products.title: Mahal Red/Natural 2 ft. x 20 ft. Border Runner Rug
products.description: Soft, durable area rug adds warmth and style to any room. Stain-resistant fibers make cleaning easy. Non-slip backing provides stability on hard floors.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is this item as pictured?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, the product matches the photos shown. Note that colors may vary slightly due to monitor settings and lighting conditions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do I clean this?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: For regular maintenance, dust with a soft, dry cloth. For deeper cleaning, use a slightly damp cloth with mild soap. Avoid harsh chemicals.

products.title: Vance Denim/Dove 2 ft. 7 in. x 10 ft. Traditional Fringed Runner Area Rug
products.description: Soft, durable area rug adds warmth and style to any room. Stain-resistant fibers make cleaning easy. Non-slip backing provides stability on hard floors.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is this item as pictured?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, the product matches the photos shown. Note that colors may vary slightly due to monitor settings and lighting conditions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do I clean this?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: For regular maintenance, dust with a soft, dry cloth. For deeper cleaning, use a slightly damp cloth with mild soap. Avoid harsh chemicals.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is mounting hardware included?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, basic mounting hardware is included. For heavy items on drywall, we recommend using wall anchors rated for the item's weight.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is this suitable for outdoor use?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This item is designed for indoor use only unless specifically noted as outdoor-rated. Exposure to weather will damage the product.
